timeline.message:
Issue #1014 - updated per PR feedback

Signed-off-by: John T.E. Timm <johntimm@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: should it support variations of those string units per the fhirpath spec
timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: I wanted to simplify it and only allow the equivalent of what the underlying java.time library allows
replies.author: JohnTimm

timeline.author: lmsurpre

timeline.bodyText: could use some javadoc to further distinguish it from evaluatesToTrue;  this one would basically just say it returns true iff it convertsToBoolean and has a true value
timeline.author: lmsurpre

timeline.bodyText: maybe some javadoc here with a link to explain that returns true if the value can be implicitly or explicitly converted to a boolean as of that table in the spec
timeline.author: lmsurpre

timeline.bodyText: could use TestNG expectedExceptions, but this is fine
timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: I prefer this approach because I can check exception type and message
replies.author: JohnTimm
